Package cscie55.hw2

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie55.hw2.Elevator
  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    name: Brendan Murphy CSCIE-55 HW 2 date: 09/29/2018 Defines an elevator class that traverses a building and drops off passengers on their requested floors

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int CAPACITY
      HW2 Requirement: Final static field that stores the number of passengers that the Elevator can accommodate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Elevator​(Building building)
      HW2 Requirement: Replace the Elevator() constructor by Elevator(Building building)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void boardPassenger​(int destinationFloor)
      HW2 Requirement: Board a passenger who wants to ride to the indicated floor this method boards a single passenger and may throw an ElevatorFullException
      void disembarkPassengers()
      Helper method to clear the array entry tracking the number of passengers destined for the floor that the elevator has just arrived at
      void fillToCapacity()
      Helper method to call board passenger once for each passenger waiting
      int getCurrentFloor()
      HW2 Requirement: Return the Elevator's current floor number.
      int getPassengers()
      HW2 Requirement: Return the number of passengers currently on the Elevator.
      void move()
      HW1 Requirement: Define a move() method which, when called, modifies the Elevator's state
      java.lang.String toString()
      HW1 Requirement: indicate the number of passengers on board, and the current floor

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentFloor

        public int getCurrentFloor()
        HW2 Requirement: Return the Elevator's current floor number. I.e., this is the number of the floor reached by the last call to Elevator.move()

      • getPassengers

        public int getPassengers()
        HW2 Requirement: Return the number of passengers currently on the Elevator.

      • move

        public void move()
        HW1 Requirement: Define a move() method which, when called, modifies the Elevator's state

      • fillToCapacity

        public void fillToCapacity()
        Helper method to call board passenger once for each passenger waiting

      • boardPassenger

        public void boardPassenger​(int destinationFloor)
                    throws ElevatorFullException
        HW2 Requirement: Board a passenger who wants to ride to the indicated floor this method boards a single passenger and may throw an ElevatorFullException
        Parameters:
        destinationFloor - an integer indicating the destination of the incoming passenger
        Throws:
        ElevatorFullException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        HW1 Requirement: indicate the number of passengers on board, and the current floor
        Overrides:

      • disembarkPassengers

        public void disembarkPassengers()
        Helper method to clear the array entry tracking the number of passengers destined for the floor that the elevator has just arrived at
